I need your Permission to create Shortcuts in Floating View. Please Grant permission by Enabling the Switch.
Also to make me Smarter Please go to Preferences, Details & Practical Info to Enable Smart Features.
Press Grant to Proceed to Settings.
Thanks! So, I am Using Accessibility Service to Create Multi-Window Mode to Open Two Apps Together.
